title: Day 1340
content:
# Day 1340

I've lost more money on paper these past two months than I had to my name across all four years of college. To be fair, I had no money in college, but watching that number evaporate is kind of insane. I honestly don't feel much because I know the long term thesis is still intact. Anyway, I'm buying more the second I see my paycheck hits.

![Recent Bitcoin Price Action](https://miro.medium.com/1*jH_pfdNJSzK1Y9F4Z6CEYQ.png)

![McDs Bitcoiner](https://miro.medium.com/1*42MSks-a7It7xUmjEmLfnQ.jpeg)

![Rocket Ship Bitcoiner](https://miro.medium.com/0*k5iZgkn_GzG0TqH9)

I am also working on making chepenik.com a Bitcoiner website. When others are fearful it's time to be greedy and build. When in doubt zoom out!

I know in 5 years we will be multiples above where we are now. That's the beauty of an asset with a finite supply.

Bitcoin has no top, because fiat has no bottom.

11/21/25

Conor Jay Chepenik
